name: df-wwlksnon
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cwwlksnon, cmpo(s0, s1, cn0, universe, cmpo(s2, s3, cfv(cvtx, cv(s1)), cfv(cvtx, cv(s1)), crab(s4, co(cv(s0), cwwlksn, cv(s1)), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s4), nat0), cv(s2)), wceq(cfv(cv(s4), cv(s0)), cv(s3)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ WWalksNOn =(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(Vtx ` s1), s3 ‚àà(Vtx ` s1)‚Ü¶ { s4 ‚àà(s0[WWalksN]s1)|((s4 ` 0)= s2 ‚àß(s4 ` s0)= s3)}))
comment: Define the collection of walks of a fixed length with particular endpoints as word over the set of vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 11-May-2021.)
